titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to expand reimbursement for travel expenses of covered beneficiaries for specialty care in order to cover specialized dental care.
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to expand reimbursement for travel expenses of covered beneficiaries for specialty care in order to cover specialized dental care.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Includes an oral surgeon, orthodontist, prosthodontist, periodontist, endodontist, or pediatric dentist as a "specialty care provider" for purposes of eligibility for reimbursement for certain travel expenses of covered beneficiaries under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services.
